Text:
How 'bout that cheesy reverb?        It must have
seemed almost magical in 1955.

the dates for these are:

tracks 1-5: June 28, 1955
originally released on "Kenny Clarke: Bohemia After Dark" (Savoy MG 12017)

Cannonball Adderley (tenor sax)
Horace Silver (piano)
Paul Chambers (bass)
Kenny Clarke (drums)
Nat Adderley (cornet on 1,2,4,5)
Donald Byrd (trumpet on 1,2,4,5)
Jerome Richardson (tenor sax & flute on 1,2,5)

tracks 6-10: July 14, 1955
originally release on "Presenting Cannonball Adderley"

Cannonball Adderley (tenor sax on 7,8,9,10)
Nat Adderley (cornet)
Hank Jones (piano)
Paul Chambers (bass)
Kenny Clarke (drums)
although track six may be from July 26, which would explain why Cannonball isn't on it.
